org.apache.commons.codec
Interface Encoder

All Known Subinterfaces:
BinaryEncoder, StringEncoder
All Known Implementing Classes:
Base64, BCodec, BinaryCodec, DoubleMetaphone, Hex, Metaphone, QCodec, QuotedPrintableCodec, RefinedSoundex, Soundex, URLCodec
public interface Encoder

Provides the highest level of abstraction for Encoders. This is the sister interface of Decoder. Every implementation of Encoder provides this common generic interface whic allows a user to pass a generic Object to any Encoder implementation in the codec package.

Version:
$Id: Encoder.java,v 1.10 2004/02/29 04:08:31 tobrien Exp $
Author:
Apache Software Foundation

Method Summary
 Object encode(Object pObject)
          Encodes an "Object" and returns the encoded content as an Object.
 

Method Detail

encode

public Object encode(Object pObject)
              throws EncoderException
Encodes an "Object" and returns the encoded content as an Object. The Objects here may just be byte[] or Strings depending on the implementation used.

Parameters:
pObject - An object ot encode
Returns:
An "encoded" Object
Throws:
EncoderException - an encoder exception is thrown if the encoder experiences a failure condition during the encoding process.
